descripcio: This Afternoon: A slight chance of rain before 2pm, then a slight chance of rain after 4pm.  Cloudy, with a high near 41. West wind 10 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph.  Chance of precipitation is 20%.

Tonight: A slight chance of snow before 11pm.  Cloudy, then gradually becoming partly cloudy, with a low around 25. West wind 14 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph.  Chance of precipitation is 20%.
Saturday: Mostly sunny, with a high near 36. West wind 14 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 31 mph.
Saturday Night: Mostly clear, with a low around 23. West wind 5 to 8 mph becoming calm  in the evening.
Veterans Day: Mostly sunny, with a high near 42. Calm wind becoming south 5 to 7 mph in the morning.
Sunday Night: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 31.
Monday: A chance of showers after 4pm.  Mostly cloudy, with a high near 45. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

Monday Night: Rain showers likely before midnight, then rain and snow showers likely between midnight and 3am, then snow showers likely after 3am.  Cloudy, with a low around 31. Chance of precipitation is 70%.

Tuesday: A chance of rain and snow showers before 1pm, then a chance of rain showers between 1pm and 4pm, then a chance of rain and snow showers after 4pm.  Mostly cloudy, with a high near 36. Chance of precipitation is 50%.
